document_data.name: Aluena Halacanter
document_data.mainbody: '''Aluena Halacanter''' was a [[sorceress]] and a member of the [[Harpers]] who led the community of [[Serpent's Cowl]] in the late mid–to–late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She was known for both her beauty and the influence she wielded in her area of the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Activities:
Aluena trained [[pegasi]] in her [[Heartwing Estate]], which was located north of the crossing of [[Boareskyr Bridge]]. She employed staff members who to teach people how to mount the winged horses.

She aided the adventurers [[Barim Stagwinter]] and [[Theskul Mirroreye]] with overseeing the tented community sprang up around Boareskyr Bridge in the mid–1360s.
document_data.Relationships: Expectantly, Aluena was acquainted with [[Elminster]], and was at one point owed a favor by the wizened [[sage]].
document_data.History:
Some time in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]], the adventuring company known as [[the Seekers]] found one of Aluena's errant pegasi and returned it to her estate. She accompanied the group to look for the steed's missing rider, and found the young man's body in the nest of some [[giant spider]]s.

After her adventurer allies left the settlement that former around Boareskyr Bridge, Aluena shifted her priorities. As of the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, Aluena was doing all she could to protect her estate at Serpent's Cowl from the growing threat of [[yuan-ti]] from the [[Forest of Wyrms]].
